mapper.update: UPDATE data_stock SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity - #{inoutQuantity}, update_date = NOW() WHERE item_id = #{itemId} and area_id =#{outAreaId}
UPDATE data_stock SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity + #{inoutQuantity}, update_date = NOW() WHERE item_id = #{itemId} and area_id= #{inAreaId}
mapper.select: SELECT ma.area, CASE WHEN ds.area_id = 1 THEN ABS(ds.stock_quantity) ELSE stock_quantity END as stockQuantity FROM data_stock ds JOIN master_area ma ON ds.area_id = ma.area_id WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
